name: Mega Hit FM
description: Mega Hit FM is ‘the number one hit music station‘ on Bonaire. With a mix of current hits from the United States and Europe, combined with the best oldies and some Spanish songs. On the hour and half hour, short news and commercials are aired. Keep it on and feel the music!

name: Cool FM 98.9 Bonaire
description: Cool FM 98.9, Everywhere With You! Entertaining the Young Professionals of Bonaire and international listeners through the world wide web with the latest hits and hottest information about diverse topics, including party information.

name: Radio 94 Korsou
description: Radio 94 Korsou welcome all of you to the house of entertainment that has been designed to give you the best radio experience no matter wheather you are living in Willemstad, Netherlands Antilles or anywhere else in the world. With songs from the popular music artists of Willemstad, Netherlands Antilles and from the whole world Radio 94 Korsou is all set to take you to a musical world where you are gonna come again and again.

name: Voz di Bonaire
description: E promé stashon radial di Bonaire a bai den aire ofishalmente dia 21 di mei 1962.

name: BON F.M. 102.7
description: BON F.M. 102.7 ta un emisora di radio di Boneiru for di 1995. Dia 6 di sèptèmber 1995 e emisora aki a kuminsa ofisialmente ku su transmishonnan. Ta trata aki di un emisora ku ta duna informashon den boletinnan di notisia i otro programanan informativo.
